attributes.action: Allow bathroom use in all of UK Schools.This is a human right.
attributes.additional_details: This is a human right not only a human right but a human need students all over the UK possibly could be facing medical issues because of this crisis
attributes.background: Allow bathroom usage in school classes.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Require schools to let children use the toilet at all times in the school day" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/731355
